      • simpleMove2

        public void simpleMove2()
        Test simpleMove2 moves the center of circle2 and verifies that the new point for circle2 is at its expected x,y location. Then, circle2 is moved back to its original position for the next test.

      • simpleMoveNeg2

        public void simpleMoveNeg2()
        Test simpleMoveNeg2 moves the center of circle2 and verifies that the new point for circle2 is at its expected x,y location. Then, circle2 is moved back to its original position for the next test.

      • scaleCircle2

        public void scaleCircle2()
        Test scaleCircle2 tests if circle2 is scaled properly, then resets the radius of circle2 to its original value for the next test. Error was discovered by test scaleCircle2. Factor was added instead of being multiplied to radius. Running the corrected test resulted in a double rounding error. Computation corrected: the option chosen to correct the error was to use the BigDecimal class and set precision to DECIMAL32 (7 digits).

      • intersectCircle2InBounds

        public void intersectCircle2InBounds()
        Test intersectCircle2InBounds calculates if circle2 and circle2a intersect when their distance is less than their combined radius. Test intersectCircle2 calculates if circle2 and circle2a intersect. Error was discovered by test intersectCircle2 Computation corrected. The calculated distance between the circles is now compared to the combined radius of both circles. Error was discovered by test intersectCircle2InBounds Corrected center.y to + yOffset

      • intersectCircle2AtBounds

        public void intersectCircle2AtBounds()
        Test intersectCircle2AtBounds calculates if circle2 and circle2a intersect when their distance is equal to their combined radius. Test intersectCircle2 calculates if circle2 and circle2a intersect. Error was discovered by test intersectCircle2 * Computation corrected. The calculated distance between the circles is now compared to the combined radius of both circles.

      • intersectCircle2OutBounds

        public void intersectCircle2OutBounds()
        Test intersectCircle2OutBounds calculates if circle2 and circle2a intersect when their distance is greater than their combined radius. Test intersectCircle2 calculates if circle2 and circle2a intersect. Error was discovered by test intersectCircle2 * Computation corrected. The calculated distance between the circles is now compared to the combined radius of both circles.
